problem.p: 3 particles have the same potential energy \(U(x)\), but they have different total mechanical energies: \(E_1\), \(E_2\) and \(E_3\). Which particle has an approximate simple harmonic motion?

choicegroup.choice: The particle with total Mechanical Energy \(E_1\).
The particle with total Mechanical Energy \(E_2\).
The particle with total Mechanical Energy \(E_3\).
